Uses of Class
packets.Packet

  • Packages that use Packet 
    Package Description
    packets  

    • Uses of Packet in packets

      Subclasses of Packet in packets 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Packet00Login
      A login Packet to enable players to connect their player to the server which forwards it to the connected clients.
      class  Packet01Disconnect
      A disconnect Packet to enable players to disconnect their player from the server which forwards it to the connected clients.
      class  Packet02Move
      A move Packet to enable players to update the position of their player to the server which forwards it to the connected clients.
      class  Packet03Shoot
      A Shoot Packet to enable players to update the server that it has fired a shot, which will then be created by the server to all connected clients.
      class  Packet04Hit
      A Hit Packet to enable players to update the server that it has hit another player and the amount of damage said player will take, which will then be created by the server to all connected clients.
